job description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:

Kforce has a client that is seeking a Senior Data Scientist - Customer Analytics in Secaucus, New Jersey (NJ).

Summary:
This is a full-time/permanent role with a Fortune 500 company located in Secaucus, New Jersey (NJ). They are rapidly expanding their management team and are looking for candidates with strong experience in Data Science to manager their Data Science group. Strong understanding of Machine Learning and Statistical Modeling needed as well as strong experience with advanced data extraction and applicable tools (such as Spark/Python/SQL).

REQUIREMENTS:
  • Bachelor's degree
  • Strong experience with Machine Learning and Statistical Modeling concepts
  • Previous management experience preferred
  • Understanding of applicable data science coding and tools (such as Spark, SQL, and Python)
  • Prior experience in Retail, Consumer Goods preferred
Kforce is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, protected veteran status, or disability status.
